channel.title: Poll on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Poll on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Good ways to meet new people? Take our poll!
item.description: Polls are fun ways to get people's opinions, and the All Our Ideas website is a particularly good form of this polling because it lets readers add their own suggestions. As an introduction to this, here's a simple poll: what are good ways that you suggest to meet new people? You'll get a choice of two from the list to pick which one is better, and if you have a better idea you can add it in.

item.title: What are we going to do about South U? Vote early, vote often!
item.description: For reference, see the Arborwiki South University page, which has some fragments of history that might be referenced in one or more poll items. Edward Vielmetti misses Steve's Lunch.
